title: Shock Totem

fields.name: While Active:
fields.value:
- The first card that this **Hex Totem**'s owner plays each turn will shock anyone the card directly affects, making them gain 1 **Card Shards** for each Charge this has gained. Then this will gain 1 Charge.
- A player with over 25 cards in hand after Shock Totem's effect will be **Destroyed**.
- Charge starts at 1 and does not deplete on its own. It has no upper limit.
- The owner is not immune to this effect.

desc:
Post 1846
- Activates a **Dull Totem** if there are any, turning it into a **Hex Totem**.
